DOC.detailed_description: This study ( MI-CP138 ) Phase 2a , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multicenter study evaluate efficacy MEDI-528 LAR adult patient atopic asthma . Approximately three investigative site Canada participate study , 40 evaluable patient randomize 1:1 ratio receive MEDI-528 ( 9.0 mg/kg ) placebo single IV infusion .
